episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0200: Mornin’, Jasmine! It’s me, the cheerful Whitney!
episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0400: Wh-what’s the matter? Are you feeling down?
episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0500:
The thing is...Ampharos doesn’t seem to be doing
so well. She looks tired.
episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0600: I’m worried she might be sick...
episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0700:
I wish there were some kind of medicine that
would make her feel better...
episode_event_winter_2022/4001_1001_0900:
Maybe she should get a checkup! Come with
me, Jasmine!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0100:
I’ve looked her over, but it doesn’t seem like
there are any health issues.
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0200:
If there is a reason, it might be related to
her feelings.
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0300:
To me, it seems she might be feeling a little
isolated and sad because Pasio is a new
environment for her.
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0400: So, to make Ampharos feel better...
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0500: Maybe we need to lighten her mood?
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0600: If that’s the case, I have a great idea!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0700: Let’s throw a party to cheer Ampharos up!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0800: Oh, a party! I think that’s a wonderful idea.
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_0900:
I’d love to organize it together...for
Ampharos’s sake!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1100:
First of all, we should change our outfits! Let’s get
dressed in something super flashy, Jasmine!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1300: Of course! Come on, let’s go!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1400: I don’t need to be too flashy...
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1500:
Trista, if you have time, please come to the
party, too!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1600: We’ll let you know when it’s ready!
episode_event_winter_2022/4002_1001_1700: Yes! I’ll be looking forward to it.
episode_event_winter_2022/6801_1031_0100:
Maybe I can prepare
some lights for everyone.
episode_event_winter_2022/6801_1001_0100:
If everyone is having a fun time under the lights,
I’ll feel happy as well.
episode_event_winter_2022/6801_1001_0200:
Me too. Seeing someone smile makes
people happy!
episode_event_winter_2022/6801_1001_0400:
*chuckle* That smile never fails to make me feel
better, Whitney.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0100:
I can’t wait to see how those decorative lights you
put up will shine, Jasmine.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0200: Sure! I’ll try hard to make them look pretty!
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0300: Jasmine, don’t you think you should rest a little?
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0400: Haven’t you been preparing since morning?
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0600: Whitney is working really hard for this party.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0700: I shouldn’t be the only one having a rest.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0800: I need to finish this by the time it gets dark.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_0900: Try not to push yourself too hard, OK?
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1000: By the way, is Whitney preparing food?
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1100: Yes! She’s asking a cook to make a feast!
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1200: She also said she’ll gather a lot of attendees.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1300: Speaking of feast...I wonder what’ll be served...
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1400:
I see. Jasmine is looking forward to the
feast... I’ll have to take note of this...
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1700: I’m here to help with the party!
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_1800:
I heard from Whitney that you’re looking for
people to invite.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2000: I also wanted to see how Ampharos was doing.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2100:
I was worried it was another case of an
Ampharos getting sick...
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2300:
Oh! You see, Ethan helped me out once before,
when another Ampharos was sick.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2500:
But this Ampharos is different from Amphy at
Olivine City’s lighthouse.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2600:
There was a Mareep the lighthouse keeper was
raising as Amphy’s successor.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2700:
I started to look after her, and she evolved
into Ampharos.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2800: One day, I want this Ampharos to be like Amphy...
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_2900:
To shine her light across the ocean from the
lighthouse and protect the boats at sea.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_3000:
But first things first. For that to happen, we need
Ampharos to get better.
episode_event_winter_2022/4003_1001_3100: OK then! Let’s get started with the prep!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0100: So, I want you to cook up a feast for our party.
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0200: No problem. That will be a piece of cake.
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0400: And...I have another thing I’d like to ask.
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0500:
You’re a cook, so you must have different kinds
of ingredients, right?
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0600: There’s a certain one that I’m looking for...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0800:
I don’t mind giving you ingredients, but I can’t
assure you I’ll have what you need...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_0900:
Oh, no worries! If you don’t have it, I’ll just go out
and look for it!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1100:
By the way, your outfit stands out quite a bit.
Are you going to wear that to the party?
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1300:
If I stand next to Sawsbuck, it’s a
cuteness overload!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1400:
I got her from a Trainer in Unova...and when I
first met her, she was a small Deerling.
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1500:
She was just the cutest thing ever, so I raised her
good, and now she’s evolved into a
splendid Sawsbuck!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1600:
When the two of us are together, everyone falls in
love with us!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1700: It’s true that you attract attention...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_1800:
But I can’t determine whether that’s because
you look fascinating or because you look strange...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_2000:
You should say stuff like, “Oh that outfit really suits
you!” Or maybe...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_2100:
“You look cute!” You need to praise
us first...
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_2200: Whoa! The light over there went out!
episode_event_winter_2022/4004_1001_2500:
I wonder if Jasmine’s OK with
her lights...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0100: Oops... I must’ve upped the voltage too much...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0200:
I came here hoping this wouldn’t be the case, but
it seems the reason for the blackout is here...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0300:
I thought maybe you could use these new lights I
invented as decorations...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0400:
But it seems Pasio’s power grid couldn’t handle
the burden.
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0500: Did you ask Volkner to help out with the lights?
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0600:
Y-yes... Since Volkner is an electrical expert,
I thought to ask him for help...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0700:
I met Volkner when I stopped by the lighthouse in
Sunyshore City...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_0800: And I also heard rumors about him, so...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1000: Um... That you, uh...stand out, in many ways...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1100: Hahaha! In many ways? That’s true!
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1200:
People don’t just mean his Pokémon battles,
do they.
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1400: There were other inventions I wanted to try out...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1700: Using this one, we can double or even—
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_1800: N-normal is fine! Normal lights will be just fine!
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_2000: I kinda wanted to see what it would look like...
episode_event_winter_2022/4005_1001_2100:
I suppose having too much expertise can also be
troublesome at times...
episode_event_winter_2022/4006_1201_0100: OK then! That’s all for today!
episode_event_winter_2022/4006_1201_0300: Battling a Champion is really tiring...
episode_event_winter_2022/4006_1201_0400:
As promised, this is to thank you for accepting
my challenge!
episode_event_winter_2022/4006_1201_0600:
I heard you’re preparing for a party, so why do
you need that?
episode_event_winter_2022/4006_1201_0800:
Anyway, be sure to come to the party! We’ll be
waiting for you!
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0100:
Hey, y’all! Thanks for waiting! It’s time to get
this party started!
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0200: Jasmine, would you like to say a few words?
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0300:
Hello, everyone. Thank you for helping us with our
party preparations.
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0400: We organized this party to cheer up Ampharos...
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0500: but I hope everyone else can enjoy it, too.
episode_event_winter_2022/4007_1001_0600:
Please brighten up this party with your
beautiful smiles.
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0200:
I think she’s enjoying herself. She seems to be
feeling better now.
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0300: Good. I’m relieved to hear that.
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0400: Yeah! It seems like this party was a success.
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0700:
I have a special present for Ampharos,
who wasn’t feeling well—and Jasmine,
who worked super hard!
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0800:
It’s a medicine that’ll give you a boost of energy,
made by yours truly!
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_0900:
I used Moomoo Milk as the base and added all
sorts of other things—Honey, Lum Berries,
a Revive...
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_1000:
It has a lot of things that’ll make you
feel energized!
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_1200:
Drink it and you won’t feel tired anymore! The
light on Ampharos’s tail might just get dazzlingly
bright, too!
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_1300:
That would be amazing! Shall we ask Ampharos
to drink it?
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_1600: It seems like the medicine was super effective.
episode_event_winter_2022/4008_1201_1700: Hahaha! I can feel her energy overflowing!
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0100:
The lights in the villages seem brighter than
usual today...
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0200: I wonder if an event is going on.
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0300: It looks just like a lighthouse...
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0500:
The light of a lighthouse guides sailors to
their destination.
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0600:
No matter how dark the ocean is, the light guides
them to where they need to go.
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0700: Light that guides you down the right path...
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0800: Team Galactic has no use for that.
episode_event_winter_2022/4010_1201_0900: We shall find and make our path by ourselves.
episode_event_winter_2022/4011_1201_0200: It’s so dark that I can’t see anything...
episode_event_winter_2022/4011_1201_0300:
Wh-what should I do? I don’t know which way
to go...
episode_event_winter_2022/4011_1201_0400:
That way? Will I be able to get home if I head
that way?
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_0400: You suddenly fainted, and everyone was worried.
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_0500: We were really, really worried about you.
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_0700:
And when you felt relieved, the tiredness came
out all at once.
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_0800: I suppose so... I’m sorry for causing a fuss...
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_1000:
It doesn’t matter if you’re able to make Ampharos
happy and make everyone smile!
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_1100: It’s no good if you faint!
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_1500: And thank you so much for worrying about me...
episode_event_winter_2022/4012_1201_1600: *sniffle* I was really worried about you!
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0200:
When I was lost in the dark, you showed me the
way home, didn’t you, Ampharos.
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0300:
It’s OK if you don’t understand what I’m saying, as
long as you’re by my side...
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0400: It’s very strange. I’m not cold at all.
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0500:
Even though the breath I exhale is white and
it’s been snowing...
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0600:
(I know why. It’s because...there’s a warm light
that brightens both us and this city...)
episode_event_winter_2022/4013_1201_0700: (And it’s right here, so close to me.)
